morjes14

Architecture HW 1

4. 
2^16 = 65,536 different patterns in a 16-bit register.
Largest signed value is 65,535
Smallest signed value is -65,535
Largest unsigned value is 65,535
Smallest unsigned value is 0

5.
1001 1100 1110 1110 = 0x9CEE = 40,174
1111 1111 1111 1111 = 0xFFFF = 65,535
0000 0000 1111 1111 = 0xFF = 255
0100 1000 1000 0100	= 0x4884 = 18,564
1111 1111 0000 0000 = 0xFF00 = 65,280
1100 1010 1111 1110 = 0xCAFE = 51,966

6.
0x40200000 = 1,075,838,976
0x41020000 = 1,090,650,112
0xC1060000 = 3,238,395,904
0xBD800000 = 3,179,282,432
0x3EAAAAAB = 1,051,372,203
0x3F000000 = 1,056,964,608
0x42FA8000 = 1,123,713,024
0x42896666 = 1,116,300,902
0x47C35000 = 1,203,982,336
0x4B189680 = 1,259,902,592

7.
2.0 = 0 10000000 00000000000000000000000
45.0 = 0 10000100 01101000000000000000000
61.01 = 0 10000100 11101000000101000111101
-18.375 = 1 10000011 00100110000000000000000
-6.68 = 1 10000001 10101011100001010001111
65536 = 0 10001111 00000000000000000000000
0.000001 = 0 01101011 00001100011011110111101
10000000.0 = 0 10010110 00110001001011010000000

8.
No, because there will always be the sign, mantissa, and exponent.

9.
Fred = 46 72 65 64 

10.
0x45617379 = Easy

11.
True, but not always especially in the case of negative integers.
